titleInfo.title: Bundling in exchange markets with indivisible goods

mods.abstract: We study efficient and individually rational exchange rules for markets with heterogeneous indivisible goods that exclude the possibility that an agent benefits by bundling goods in her endowment. Even if agents' preferences are additive, no such rule exists. (c) 2006 Elsevier B.V All rights reserved.
